resources.string: My First Heading My first paragraph.

**AndroTainer** is an open source app. This *SERVICE* is provided by Dokeraj at no cost and is intended for use as is.
Source code can be found here: https://github.com/dokeraj/AndroTainer

For any further inquiries: dokeraj87@gmail.com

 Privacy policy: [find it here](https://sites.google.com/view/androtainer/privacy-stuff)

`Current version: %1$s`
`ANY DELETED CREDENTIAL WILL ONLY BE REMOVED FROM ANDROTAINER`\n\nPro tip: You can find the stored credentials by swiping right on the login screen.
If `CONTINUE` is chosen, you will be logged out and pushed back to the login screen.
